title: Should turrets on normal Summoner's Rift be like the ones in ARURF?
body:
This might just be me, but I feel like the turrets in ARURF are WAY stronger than the ones on normal Summoner's Rift.

However, It didn't feel like they were broken or anything.

And with people complaining that turrets are feeling really weak and meh, I can't help but think:

Should turrets be changed?

(Keep in mind, I have done absolutely no research on this whatsoever so I have no evidence to support that the turrets are in fact stronger)

replies.body:
? the only reason turrents felt different in arurf was because people didn't care about them and were tower diving at lvl 1 so much because of spam.

It's the same turrents no difference.

Well then.

It seems my theory has been debunked, then.

Would you still want stronger turrets or just keep the turrets as they are now?

mmm... slightly stronger, people can still be lvl 1 tower dove by 4 people and all can live easily. People can be easily tower dove by lvl 3 and basically that tower won't do anything important.

But not too much stronger, just enough for people to recognize that there actually is a tower and plan a dive instead of just, lalala ignore the tower and kill whoever
